name: LONG
description: The LONG Legacy, Tomoji's premier collection, is created by Sean Kyah Koons. Thee dragon-themed ERC404 token series commences with a unique twist: collectors first receive a mysterious dragon egg, a digital emblem of potential and beginnings. As time unfolds, these eggs hatch into magnificent dragons, each symbolizing the power and prosperity associated with the Chinese Year of the Dragon, fused with the contemporary essence of crypto or stock trading - the strategy of 'longing'.
